Author: akkartik
Content: :) There's something to this. When you have to read your own code a lot of it lingers still, so it's often easier to hold in your head. Importing other people's code into your head is usually more effort, proportional at least to project size regardless of how well-written it is.

Author: johnrob
Content: Remember the blub vs better languages debates?  Chalk one up for better languages, where you get more done with LESS people.  Have fun trying to hire java engineers in the valley right now :)
